name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_239U
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "U" means the element "uranium" and "239U" is the isotope "uranium-239" with a half-life of 1.63e-02 days.
